sections.title: About Me
sections.content:
I'm a passionate AI Engineer with expertise in cybersecurity transitioning into cutting-edge artificial intelligence research and development. My journey involves building production-grade transformer architectures from scratch, with a focus on high-performance, scalable AI systems.

I'm actively pursuing opportunities at leading AI research organizations like OpenAI, Google DeepMind, and Meta AI, where I can contribute to advancing the state of the art in transformer architectures and large language models.

sections.title: Projects
sections.content:
Production-Grade Transformer from Scratch

Building a high-performance transformer architecture comparable to GPT-4 scale with distributed training, tensor parallelism, and custom CUDA optimizations.

  • Implemented distributed multi-GPU training with PyTorch DDP
  • Developed tensor parallel linear layers (Megatron-style)
  • Created fused Rotary Position Embeddings (RoPE) with Triton
  • Optimized attention with FlashAttention implementation
  • Achieved performance comparable to industry standards

Advanced Normalization Techniques

Researched and implemented production-optimized normalization layers including RMSNorm with CUDA optimizations.

  • 15-20% faster than standard LayerNorm
  • Better memory access patterns
  • Improved training stability

AI Security Framework

Leveraging cybersecurity background to develop secure AI training and deployment practices.

  • Adversarial training techniques
  • Model robustness evaluation
  • Secure multi-tenant inference
